item.title: Interactive storytelling with Octobo’s Yuting Su
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: In this special Corona Geek podcast we talked with Yuting Su, developer of Octobo, a reactive plush octopus that comes with a storybook. Yuting shares how she came up with the idea for creating a plushy with sensors in it that can detect objects and create a rich interactive story telling experience for children.
item.content:encoded:
In this special Corona Geek podcast we talked with Yuting Su, developer of Octobo, a reactive plush octopus that comes with a storybook. Yuting shares how she came up with the idea for creating a plushy with sensors in it that can detect objects and create a rich interactive storytelling experience for children. Yuting shares what it have been like to developer her idea and show it off at a variety of gaming industry events like GDC, E3, and Casual Connect.
